single.title: Device
single.searchString: | inputlookup Cisco_Device | search host=$form.host$ | fields host | appendcols [search sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome host=$form.host$ | rename hostname AS host | fields host | head 1]

table.title: Device info
table.searchString: sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome host=$form.host$ | stats latest(model) AS model, latest(serial_number) AS serial_number, latest(software_version) AS software_version, latest(series) AS series, latest(site_id) AS site_id

table.title: Severities
table.searchString: | pivot Cisco_IOS_Event Cisco_IOS_Event count(Cisco_IOS_Event) AS "Count of Event" SPLITROW severity_name AS "severity_name" SORT 100 severity_name FILTER host is $form.host$

table.title: Events
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco_ios host=$form.host$ | table _time facility subfacility severity_id mnemonic message_text

table.title: Smart Call Home (temporary)
table.searchString: host=$form.host$ sourcetype=Cisco:SmartCallHome | fields - _*, date*, punct, linecount, index, eventtype, source, sourcetype, splunk_server, tag, tag::eventtype, time*pos, "soap-env:Envelope.soap-env:Body.aml-block:Block.aml-block:Attachments.aml-block:Attachment.aml-block:Data" | stats values(*) | transpose
